author: treyzania
content: <@!278762485497069569> don't know if I can contribute to that question directly but you may be interested in some of the state rent proposals where inactive accounts are rolled into an accumulator eventually

author: phabc
content: I was mainly curious about this fact so we can do some lobbying with exchanges that create 1 EOA per deposit and ask them to re-use the same address per user, if it proves to be an issue for the health of the chain

author: treyzania
content: I don't see why exchanges haven't devised a "exchange deposit contract" standard that you have to call a function on to deposit to

author: treyzania
content: and you specify a invoice number or something on

author: treyzania
content: bit of a privacy leak actually, that could be why
